data.name: MessageBoxTextAreYouSureYouWantToExit

data.name: ControlName_ToggleSignalsMode_Tooltip
data.value: Toggles signals between fading mode and always visible mode.

data.name: NoPlaceToCreateGrid
data.value: There's no place to create a new block. Point your view to an empty space.

data.name: ScreenCubeBuilderHint
data.value: Hint: Drag an icon to a toolbar slot and activate by a numeric key

data.name: SomeWorldFilesCouldNotBeLoaded
data.value: One of the world/save files is corrupted and can't be loaded. See log for details.

data.name: WorldFileIsCorruptedAndCouldNotBeLoaded
data.value: World file is corrupted and could not be loaded.

data.name: ToolTipNewWorldCustomWorld
data.value: Create a new world with custom settings

data.name: ToolTipVideoOptionsRenderQuality
data.value: Higher rendering quality means better visuals, larger view distance and more special effects - however, it is more demanding on your computer's performance (CPU and GPU). If the game doesn't run smoothly, decrease it.

data.name: ToolTipVideoOptionsVideoAdapter
data.value: Select a graphic adapter and/or a monitor. Changing the adapter requires restart of the game.

data.name: ToolTipVideoOptionsVideoMode
data.value: Select a screen resolution. We recommend using an aspect ratio compatible with your monitor. If the game doesn't run smoothly, decrease your screen resolution.

data.name: ToolTipVideoOptionsHardwareCursor
data.value: HW mouse cursor is independent of game framerate. We recommend to turn it on.

data.name: ToolTipVideoOptionsCaptureMouse
data.value: Whether the cursor should be captured by the game window (for Windowed and Fullscreen Window modes).

data.name: ToolTipVideoOptionsVerticalSync
data.value: The game will synchronize with the refresh rate of the monitor. We recommend to turn it off.

data.name: MessageBoxTextRestartNeededAfterAdapterSwitch
data.value: Changing adapter requires restarting the game. Restart now?

data.name: ToolTipGameOptionsShowControlsHints
data.value: Show on-screen control hints during gameplay

data.name: WorldNotSaved
data.value: World '{0}' failed to save. This can be caused by running out of memory or problems when writing files. Working on this world any longer may result in loss of progress. You can check log file to find out more about what caused this error.

data.name: NotificationMemoryOverload
data.value: Not enough memory to add new objects

data.name: BetterGCIsAvailable
data.value: We have detected a better graphics card in your computer than the one the game currently runs on. Please check your NVIDIA/AMD Control Panel settings.

data.name: MessageBoxModsMismatch
data.value: These mods were created in development version. They could cause issues in game

data.name: MessageBoxTextOpenBrowser
data.value: This will open {0} in your internet browser. The game will keep running. Do you want to continue?

data.name: MessageBoxTextNoSavedWorlds
data.value: There are no saved worlds yet. Please start by creating a new world.

data.name: ErrorNameAlreadyExists
data.value: Name is already used. Please choose a different name.

data.name: NotificationColorFormat
data.value: Press {0} or {1} to change color. Hold {2} to apply color. Hold {3} or {4} to increase brush size.

data.name: NotificationHideHintsInGameOptions
data.value: You can hide these hints in Game Options

data.name: NotificationUnlimitedBuildingFormat

data.value: Note: Not all screens support skin at the moment

data.value: Show a warning whenever the game's performance slows down

data.name: PerformanceWarningHeading
data.value: PERFORMANCE WARNINGS Press Ctrl + {0} for more info

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaAIDescription
data.value: Updating AI and pathfinding. Turn off cyberhounds and spiders.

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaBlocksDescription
data.value: Update of individual blocks. Too many blocks in the world.

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaClearAndGeometryRenderDescription
data.value: Rendering world geometry. Lower your voxel quality.

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaConveyorDescription
data.value: Update of conveyors. Too many conveyors or blocks using conveyors in the world.

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaGridDescription
data.value: Updating of ship systems other than oxygen, gyroscopes and conveyors.

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaGyroDescription
data.value: Update of gyroscope systems. Too many gyroscopes in the world.

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaLightsDescription
data.value: Rendering lights. Too many artificial lights in the world.

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaOxygenDescription
data.value: Update of oxygen systems. Too many or too large pressurized areas.

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaPhysicsDescription
data.value: Update of physics. Too many individual objects interacting with each other.

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaRenderFoliageDescription
data.value: Rendering foliage (grass). Lower your foliage settings.

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaScriptsDescription
data.value: Executing programmable blocks' scripts. Too many or too complicated scripts.

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaShadowsDescription
data.value: Rendering shadows. Lower your shadow quality.

data.value: Player {0} is transfering ownership of {1} blocks in ship {2} to you. Do you accept?

data.name: MessageBoxTextBlockLimitDisableWarning
